unnormalised: Arey bhai, pesticide use is too much, no? Remember what happened in Vidarbha back in '06? My nani always says, organic is best! We should be like Kerala, using more natural methods. Even Amul is pushing for it now! Thinking of starting a kitchen garden this Diwali. Maybe at 17:00 hrs on 26/01/2024, I'll sow the first seeds. Rs. 500 ka pesticide, waste! 10/10/2023 was the last time I used that stuff, never again!
normalised: Arey bhai, pesticide use is too much, no? Remember what happened in Vidarbha back in two thousand and six? My nani always says, organic is best! We should be like Kerala, using more natural methods. Even Amul is pushing for it now! Thinking of starting a kitchen garden this Diwali. Maybe at seventeen hundred hours on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four, I'll sow the first seeds. Rupee five hundred ka pesticide, waste! tenth october two thousand and twenty three was the last time I used that stuff, never again!
